meta.camera: iPhone 15 Pro Max, Main Lens, RAW Mode
meta.style: Authentic mobile photography, candid winter snapshot, bright natural daylight, high texture fidelity, unedited raw look with natural grain, perfect vertical composition.

subject.identity: A stunning young woman with long wavy platinum blonde hair and deep blue eyes.

face_details.eyes: Light blue, squinting slightly due to the bright sun, looking off to the side.
face_details.skin: Light tone, natural texture with visible pores and slight freckles across the nose, rosy cheeks from the cold.
face_details.expression: Thoughtful and alluring, with her right index finger gently touching her lower lip.
face_details.hair: Platinum blonde, styled in two messy high buns (space buns) with loose, wavy strands framing her face.

body.pose: Standing straight on a snowy balcony, angled slightly to show her defined, voluptuous hourglass figure and athletic proportions.
body.hands: Right hand raised near her mouth, left arm relaxed by her side, partially holding the draped jacket.

outfit.bodysuit: A form-fitting, light blue ribbed knit bodysuit that conforms tightly to her curves.
outfit.jacket: An oversized beige faux fur jacket, draped loosely off her shoulders and held by her arms.
outfit.legwear: Thick white knit leg warmers, slouched realistically around her calves and ankles.

environment.location: A snow-covered balcony on a bright, clear winter day.
background_elements: White metal balcony railing in the foreground, covered in a thick layer of fresh snow.
A dense forest of bare, snow-dusted trees in the distance under a clear, vibrant blue sky.
Deep, untouched snow covering the ground below the balcony level.

lighting.source: Bright, harsh, direct natural sunlight coming from the upper right, casting distinct, sharp shadows.
lighting.quality: Creates strong highlights on her skin, hair, and the crystalline snow, emphasizing the cold, crisp atmosphere.

realism_focus.textures: Incredible tactile detail on the ribbed knit fabric, soft faux fur fibers, knit patterns of the leg warmers, individual hair strands, and the powdery texture of the snow.
realism_focus.imperfections: Natural film grain, authentic lens flare from the bright sun, and realistic skin texture without any artificial smoothing.
